about.summary: Cardoso's JADE algorithm as well as his functions for joint diagonalization are ported to R. Also several other blind source separation (BSS) methods, like AMUSE and SOBI, and some criteria for performance evaluation of BSS algorithms, are given. The package is described in Miettinen, Nordhausen and Taskinen (2017) <doi:10.18637/jss.v076.i02>.

name: r-jade
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.0-3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-jade
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/JADE_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/JADE/JADE_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 56d68a993fa16fc6dec758c843960eee840814c4ca2271e97681a9d2b9e242ba

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-clue
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-clue

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('JADE')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('JADE')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=JADE
  license: GPL-2
  summary: "Cardoso's JADE algorithm as well as his functions for joint diagonalization are ported to R. Also several other blind source separation (BSS) methods,\
    \ like AMUSE and SOBI, and some criteria for performance evaluation of BSS algorithms, are given. The package is described in Miettinen, Nordhausen and Taskinen\
    \ (2017) <doi:10.18637/jss.v076.i02>. "
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - MathiasHaudgaard
    - FrodePedersen
    - ArneKr

# Package: JADE
# Type: Package
# Title: Blind Source Separation Methods Based on Joint Diagonalization and Some BSS Performance Criteria
# Version: 2.0-2
# Date: 2019-08-19
# Author: Klaus Nordhausen, Jean-Francois Cardoso, Jari Miettinen, Hannu Oja, Esa Ollila, Sara Taskinen
# Maintainer: Klaus Nordhausen <klaus.nordhausen@tuwien.ac.at>
# Imports: clue, graphics
# Suggests: ICS, ICSNP
# Description: Cardoso's JADE algorithm as well as his functions for joint diagonalization are ported to R. Also several other blind source separation (BSS) methods, like AMUSE and SOBI, and some criteria for performance evaluation of BSS algorithms, are given. The package is described in Miettinen, Nordhausen and Taskinen (2017) <doi:10.18637/jss.v076.i02>.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyData: true
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2019-08-19 12:20:10 UTC; knordhause
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-08-19 13:10:08 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
